greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of weakly unimodal compositions of n in which the greatest part occurs exactly five times.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n) ~ Pi^4 * exp(2*Pi*sqrt(n/3)) / (16 * 3^(7/4) * n^(13/4)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 24 2018
mathematica: a /@ Range[0, 70] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Apr 22 2021, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Oct 10 2018
